employ.translate: использовать, нанимать, служба, работа по найму
examples: How long have you been employed at this job?
They employ a total of 150 staff.
He was in the employ of the city

How many people has she employed?

Her days are employed in gardening and voluntary work.
The report examines teaching methods employed in the classroom.
The parties agreed to employ an appraiser to value the company.

You must do the job yourself or else employ someone else to do it.
